short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the latest spotlight science and technology news from Phys.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The official Phys.org extension for Google Chrome allows readers to peruse spotlight science and technology news. Clicking on an article title opens it in a new tab. 

Features:
- unread count for new stories;
- updates every 10 minutes.
